content: note hat and wristlets are made using one strand of yarn and the smaller hook scarf is made with 3 strands held together and the larger hook scarf is worked sideways hat circumference 18 20 22 45 7 50 8 55 9 cm wrist circumference 7 7 1/2 8 17 8 19 20 32 cm scarf 5 1/2 x 60 152 4 x 14 cm gauge scarf 8 sts and 10 row = 4 10 cm with 3 strands held together using larger hook in pat hat & wristlets 15 sts and 18 row = 4 10 cm with one strand and smaller hook in pat materials yarn for hat 1 strand * 1 ball no 3720 lavender ca * 1 ball no 3729 grape cb * 1 ball no 4608 wine cc yarn for scarf 3 strands held together * 1 ball no 3720 lavender ca * 1 ball no 3729 grape cb * 1 ball no 4608 wine cc yarn for wristlets 1 strand * 1 ball no 3720 lavender ca small amounts of no 3729 grape cb and no 4608 wine cc additional materials * yarn needle * cardboard 1 1/2 in and 3 in 3 8 and 7 5 cm for pompoms
